Imperial Rule Assistance Society: All political parties have been voluntarily disbanded in the interest of the Emperor of Japan, seated on the throne and representing a divine succession that has been unbroken for ages. Our Imperial subjects must do their duties faithfully and diligently. Our Empire needs to mobilize against all enemies who don't accept our generous offers of friendship and fail to comprehend our Empire's far-sighted goal of world peace.
Glory to the Rising Sun! Banzai! Banzai!

Despite our efforts, the uprising of workers in Niigata Prefecture is still ongoing. Not only that but it has escalated out of our control: Inspired by the Nagaoka protests, trade unions in cities all across the Home Islands have begun spreading rumors about a nationwide general strike.
Negotiation is still the best way
The death of Prime Minister Inukai

After the turmoil that has engulfed our great nation, a small group of dissidents have assassinated the Prime Minister. The great tragedy is that it was in front of H.I.M. and now His Majesty has taken a direct interest in what is to be done.
Reform and set up a democratic government
Dissolve the Diet and establish a military council

As the Niigata Riots were beginning to take form, we decided to introduce a series of special pieces of legislation which would, in practice, allow for martial law to be implemented in certain regions. Now that the riots have begun to fade and the workers are returning to their factories, it would be wise to return these areas to normal governance.
Extend martial law to all of Japan
Unfortunately the two factions cannot agree on anything and now H.I.M. must choose which shall lead in his name.
Kodoha, to return to the true origins of the samurai
Toseiha, for the protection of the Empire

His Imperial Majesty Hirohito has been shot by a radical Syndicalist who was infuriated by the miltary takeover of the nation, His Majesty is in critical condition and the doctors are not sure if he will live...
His Majesty is dead, Prince Chichibu becomes regent.

It has been three years since Prince Chichibu became regent for his nephew Akihito but now many in the radical Kodoha clique, which the regent supports, have now told the regent they would help him in overthrow his nephew and become Emperor himself.
That would be wrong. He is the true emperor.
Prime Minister Hayashi Senjuro is dead!
Prime Minister Hayashi has died today. The Emperor should appoint a new member of the Toseiha for the position but will he?
A member of the Toseiha and a General in our army, Hayashi Senjuro, has died today.
The brother of the Emperor and a member of the Kohoda clique has died today.
Regent for his nephew since the assassination of Emperor Showa, has died today, Akihito will now assume full powers as Emperor.

Having assumed the Throne in a so called 2nd Meiji Restoration, Emperor Yasuhito could not escape from those who called him a usurper and in the west he was called 'the Japanese Richard III', his posthumous name will be Go-Meiji, however with no children of his own, Akihito will now finnaly become Emperor.

Japan had fought with France and England in the Weltkreig. However the lack of success had all but destroyed Japan’s willingness to stay with their allies. His Majesty the Emperor, wishing to give Japan as many choices as possible, decided to dissolve the accords and with it many of our relations with the Entente.
It is time to find our own path

The time has come for a new general election. With the main and opposition parties now running, the choices are more varied than they have been since the late 19th century. After the elections were complete, His Majesty the Emperor has asked the new Prime Minister to form his cabinet.
Conservative Seiyukai defends the absolute majority
Liberal Minseito gains a major victory
Conservative Seiyukai defends the absolute majority
Liberal Minseito gains a major victory
Socialist Taishuto sweeps the rural areas
Every four years according to our constition we hold a general election and the winner chooses the prime minister to serve in the Emperor's cabinet. Who shall win?
Conservative Seiyukai defends the absolute majority
Liberal Minseito gains a major victory
Socialist Taishuto sweeps the rural areas
Every four years according to our constition we hold a general election and the winner chooses the prime minister to serve in the Emperor's cabinet. Who shall win?
Conservative Seiyukai defends the absolute majority
Liberal Minseito gains a major victory
Socialist Taishuto sweeps the rural areas
Every four years according to our constition we hold a general election and the winner chooses the prime minister to serve in the Emperor's cabinet. Who shall win?
Conservative Seiyukai defends he absolute majority
Liberal Minseito gains the major victory
Socialist Taishuto sweeps the rural areas
Every four years according to our constition we hold a general election and the winner chooses the prime minister to serve in the Emperor's cabinet. Who shall win?
Conservative Seiyukai defends the absolute majority
Liberal Minseito gains a major victory
Socialist Taishuto sweeps the rural areas
Every four years according to our constition we hold a general election and the winner chooses the prime minister to serve in the Emperor's cabinet. Who shall win?
Conservative Seiyukai defends he absolute majority
Liberal Minseito gains a major victory
Socialist Taishuto sweeps the rural areas
Our mortal enemies have made successful landings on our sacred islands! The nation must fully mobilize in order to stop them!...

A decision on Taiwan's status must be made. The island have been under Japanese control since 1895 and though the Japanese language is wide-spread throughout the island, Chinese is still the most commonly used language. The Qing Empire, as well as every nationalist faction on the Chinese mainland, claims Taiwan and as long as Chinese is the most popular language, we fear that the Taiwanese people might seek protection from the Qing Empire if an opportunity is given. Something must be done!
Fully integrate Taiwan into the Empire!
They shall be granted independence... On our terms
Our policies on Taiwan were succesful and now Taiwan is now firmly integrated into our glorious Empire!

The selection of Germany as the largest threat to Japan was almost a given. Japanese grevencies were many and competition between the two was fierce over China. Electing to go after Germany lead to another big question, how should we go about it?
If Germany loses influence in China, it will start a domino effect !
Concentrate on German colonies in pacific !

China had long been in the eyes of Japan. To the south of Manchuria laid the Qing Empire. As part of the diplomatic treaty, Japan had allowed a major railway to run between the two nations as a symbol of unity. Ironically, the railway would serve as a reason to push for war. The colonel of the garrison staged an incident that resulted in the death of 25 Manchurians and 12 Japanese with the blame being placed on the neighboring Qing garrison.
Demand financial sanctions and monetary compensation
A Show of Force is the only course of action!

China had long been in the eyes of Japan. To the south of Manchuria laid the Qing Empire. As part of the diplomatic treaty, Japan had allowed a major railway to run between the two nations as a symbol of unity. Ironically, the railway would serve as a reason to push for war. The colonel of the garrison staged an incident that resulted in the death of 25 Manchurians and 12 Japanese with the blame being placed on the neighboring Qing garrison.
Demand financial sanctions and monetary compensation
A Show of Force is the only course of action!

Japan has claimed that our garisson has fired upon and killed 25 Manchurians and 12 Japanese and as a result, they are demanding that we turn over our northern border with them for safety of their Manchurian allies.
Give into the demands of the Japanese
Put our fate in Berlin's hands, appeal to Germany for Intervention
The Qing Empire bows to our demands
The threat of Japanese power was enough to bend the so called Qing Emperor to our will.
Glory to the Land of the Rising Sun!
The Qing Empire has appealed to us to arbitrate over a dispute involving the death of 25 Manchurians and 12 Japanese.
The Japanese claims are fabricated, reject them
Offer a compromise to appease the Japanese

Our decision to let German Empire mediate dispute between us and Japan ended in disaster. German Empire, not wishing another conflict in the Far East decided to back up Japaneese claims. What shall we do ?.
Give into the demands of the Japanese
A German-Backed Qing refuses our Demands
The German lapdogs, the Qing have gained their master's support and they have rejected the generous offer put fourth by our government
No Matter, we will carry through!
We must bide our time, Let them think we have backed down
The Stakes are too high, we must back down
Japan Attacks the Qing and German Empires
After causing an incident with the Qing Empire, Japan declared war on us and the Qing and the Fengtein soon followed suit.
We must Ally with the Qing
The German lapdogs, the Qing have rejected the generous offer put fourth by our government and they have failed to gain their Master's support.
What they will not politely give, we shall take!
We must bide our time, Let them think we have backed down
What were we thinking? Back Down!

The cowardly Qing, fearing Japanese preditions appealed to Germany for help. Germany put forward a compromise offer to Japan. Qing Empire will be forced to adjust its borders slightly, but we must accept its independence and existing borders.
Their offer is fair, we accept the German's comprimise
This is offer is not worth the paper it is written on!

The Germans have offered both sides a comprimise. We give our portion of Inner Mongolia to the Japanese in exchange for peace and afterwards, we sign a Non-Aggression Pact to ensure peace in the future.
Three Worthless Provinces in exchange for Peace? Its a deal
We won't give them an inch!
The Qing Empire Accepts The Comprimise
The Qing have accepted the German engineered Comprimise, and we have received the Qing held territory in the Inner Mongolia region, as well as signing a Pact of Non-Aggression.
Huzzah! Our Fengtian allies will administrate the new territory!
The Qing Empire Accepts The Comprimise
The Qing have accepted the German engineered Comprimise, and we have received the Qing held territory in the Inner Mongolia region, as well as signing a Pact of Non-Aggression.
The Qing refuses the German Comprimise
The Qing have arrogantly refused the German engineered Comprimise.
Then what they shall not give, we shall take!
After the Qing Empire refused the comprimise we carefully engineered, Japan declared war and the Fengtein followed suit.
We tried to solve the conflict peacefully, we can not afford war
Japan has claimed that our garisson has fired upon and killed 25 Manchurians and 12 Japanese and as a result, they have placed sanctions on us and demanded monetary compensation.
Give into the demands of the Japanese
Japan has launched a series of strikes along the Qing border. The Qing have called for our aid in repelling the Japanese attack.
Japanese expansion into Asia must be stopped at all costs!
We must help the Qing, but we can not get militarily involved
Japan is justified, we refuse to get involved

After the utter defeat of the Imperial Japanese Army, our imperial army controls huges swathes of land in Manchuria and Korea whilst the IJN are reduced to attempting mere blockades. Our man in Tokyo reports severe dissent and war weariness amongst the populace. In light of this, the government has called a conference in occupied Port Arthur to determine our war aims.
Humiliate the Empire of the Setting Sun!

This is a dark day for the Empire of the Sun. Chinese forces have ousted our men from their vital bases in Manchuria and Korea. On top of this, a declaration has been sent out from Port Arthur by the imperial government offering terms that demand our surrender of all territories on the Chinese mainland as well as the return of Taiwan and independence of Korea.
We yield because we have no choice
The Qing defeats Japan and Korea is freed
The Qing have nearly unified China!
Japan is defeated and Korea is freed
We have retaken our ancestral homeland of Manchuria, and now Korea is under our control!

After the Empire of China pushed the Japanses back to their own Island, Transamur has been in chaos. The Japanese Elite have fled back to their home and the country is in chaos. The people are ready to depose of Kolchak and return to the Motherland's Control.
Move in and bring Transamur back under our Control
The Japaneese empire has been utterly defeated by their mortal enemies and forced to surrender all of their mainland territory. We may be able to force them to make a similar deal with us.
Demand all territory outside Japan itself
The war will continue until we see fit
The Germans demand our oversea territory
After being defeated by our mortal enemies, the Germans are now demanding that we turn over all our remaining territory outside our own sacred soil to them.
We Give up! As long as our sacred homeland is intact!
The war with the Empire of Japan and their lackeys now seems hopeless. It may be time to sue for peace.
Our empire shall fight to the bitter end!

Following a series of bloody battles along the Qing border, the Qing government had realized that they were too weak to defend against the might of the Japanese Empire and capitulated. Now with Japanese forces occupying the Qing capital, it must be decided what shall be done with the Qing.
We will control the Chinese from the shadows...
The Manchurians will keep the Chinese people under control
Set up new regime in Northern China !
After the surrender of the Qing Empire, Japan has given us their former territory and expects us to keep it under our control for them.

In order to secure pathways for our expansionism against German Empire and its allies it is imperative to secure alliance with Siam as it is located nearby many German key positions in Pacific, namely Singapore, Indochina and Brunei. We can promise them territorial gain on account of German Empire in order to get them to join our alliance.
There is no need for alliance

Japanese Empire has approached us with interesting proposal. Since Japan plans war with German Empire and its allies in Pacific it needs us in its alliance block, since we are located near many crucial German colonies in Pacific. In order to gain our approval, Japan promise us entire Malay peninsula together with Indochina after end of victorious war against German Empire. Do we want to join Co-prosperity sphere and risk potentially lethal conflict with German Empire ?
Siam accepted our offer to drive out Germans and their lackeys from Asia and joined Co-prosperity sphere !
There is no need for alliance
Burma accepted our offer to stop expansion of Japan and its lackeys in Indochina and joined Mitteleuropa alliance !

With eruption of the grand military conflict in Asia , some important members of general staff have suggested to directly involve our colony AOG into war conflict, since its vast armies and strategical location could decisively turn war in our favor. Still AOG board of directors warns us, that although they are willing to help motherlnad, this effort could seriously destabilize fragile stability of this colony...
There is no need for alliance

With eruption of the grand military conflict in Asia German Empire despite our pleads decided to involve our colony into war. There is not much to decide on this matter, as we can not disobey direct order from Berlin......
AOG joins our war effort in Asia !
AOG board of directors accepted our order and its vast ,albeit untrained armies are finally involved into war conflict in Asia !
Our mortal enemy, Imperial Germany, is losing its war.  Perhaps it is the best time to issue an ultimatum in which we will demand all German lands in Asia ?  The time of liberation is at hand.
Our mortal enemy, Imperial Germany, is losing its war.  Perhaps it is the best time to issue an ultimatum in which we will demand all German lands in Asia?  The time of liberation is at hand.
The Japanese have Issued an Ultimatum
The Japanese Consul in Saigon has delivered a letter from Tokyo.  The news is really bad
column3: since we have lost the war and were forced to capitulate, we have lost all might and power in Asia, and the Japanese like hungry vultures are going to incorporate our Asian colonies into their Co-Prosperity Sphere.

Imperial Rule Assistance Society: The Japanese have Issued an Ultimatum
The Japanese Consul in Saigon has delivered a letter from Tokyo.  The news is really bad
column3: since we have lost the war and were forced to capitulate, we have lost all might and power in Asia, and the Japanese like hungry vultures are going to incorporate our Asian colonies into their Co-Prosperity Sphere.

Imperial Rule Assistance Society: The Germans have Refused Our Ultimatum
The stubborn and foolish Germans will pay for their arrogance.  Let the war begin!
Now is Not the Time for War
German colonial possesions in our hands

Our glorious armed forces have succesfully captured every part of German colonial possesion in Asia. The most of generality is convinced that our grand victories should allow us to dictate terms of peace with German Empire favorable to us...
We have achieved all our goals !

After series of crushing land and naval defeats, our forces were completely pushed from Asian theatre. Victorious Empire of the Rising sun, achieving all its goals have offered us peace treaty in which we will recognize all territorial gain achieved by Japan and withdrawn all our remaining forces from Asia....

With German colonial possesions in Asia secured, we must now choose our next step in reienforcing co-prosperity sphere. We can either choose to expand in different startegic directions or give up our expansionist plans.
We must secure China for co-prosperity sphere !
Abandon expansionism, we have achieved our goals !

With territory of China secured, we must now choose our next step in reienforcing co-prosperity sphere. We can either choose to expand in different startegic directions or give up our expansionist plans.
We must seize German colonial possesions !
Abandon expansionism, we have achieved our goals !

With the recent war that sparked between Germany and the Internationale, we could use the opportunity to claim our rightfull role as the sole great power in Asia and in the Pacific: we must demand all German Pacific possessions as well as their Chinese concessions. If they don't meet our demands... Well... They just can't fight a war in Europe and Asia at the same time, can them?
We can't afford this war right now

For months already, the Japanese Empire has expressed their ambitions towards our Chinese and Pacific holdings, as part of their expansionist policies. Today, the Japanese ambassador to Berlin has presented us an ultimatum: they demand that we surrender our possessions in China and in the Pacific, or else we will face their arms...
Germany did not deliver any answer to our ultimatum. We must mobilize to war and secure our place as the sole great power in East Asia!
Back down, we can't rist a war
Germany has accepted our conditions. This is not so surprising after all: they wouldn't dare face our mighty arms!

For months already, the Japanese Empire has expressed their ambitions towards German Chinese and Pacific holdings, as part of their expansionist policies. Today, the Japanese ambassador in our capital secretly informed us, that Japan is ready to make its move against German colonial possesions and they are requesting our support in this matter...

With the recent war that sparked between Germany and the Internationale, we could use the opportunity to claim our rightfull role in China. Qing Empire is weak and it should not be hard to force to accept all our economical and political requests. If they don't meet our demands, they will be forced to face our glorious armed forces !
We can't afford war right now

For months already, the Japanese Empire has expressed their ambitions towards establishing a new order in China, as part of their expansionist policies. Today, the Japanese ambassador in our capital secretly informed us, that Japan is ready to make its move against everyone who dares to oppose new order and they are requesting our support in this matter...

Russian state during secret meeting accepted our ambitions regarding new order in China as reasonable and offered full support of the russian armed forces in this endavour. We are free to launch invasion of China with support of our powerfull ally !

With eruption of the grand military conflict in Asia , some important members of general staff have suggested to directly involve our colony AOG into war conflict, since its vast armies and strategical location could decisively turn war in our favor. Still AOG board of directors warns us, that although they are willing to help motherlnad, this effort could seriously destabilize fragile stability of this colony...
There is nothing we can do.....
German diplomatic ambassador on behalf of government in Berlin offered our homeland military support of the German Empire in our struggle with Japan and its lackeys. How shall we react ?
Qing Empire joins our war effort in Asia !
Qing Empire accepted our offer and now they are part of our grand Mitteleuropa alliance !

Since eruption of the conflict in the western Europe, German positions in Asia were seriously weakened. Japan seeing this decided to use this opportunity to force us into submission. Their ambasador have brought us official demand from Japanese government regarding political and economical restructurization of our state. Accepting this would mean an end of our state as an independent nation. Hovewer fighting obviously strong Japan could mean complete disaster for us and entire China. How shall we react ?
Qing Empire was forced to accept all our economical and political demands. Our diplomacy have succesfully secured Qing Empire as part of the Great Co-Prosperity sphere !
In show of absolute arrogance, government of the Qing Empire outright refused our reasonable demands, calling them insane and absurd. How shall we react to this slight against Japanese nation ?
We can't afford this war right now

Japan decided in order to build a proper nation, they must look beyond their region as Germany had appeared for Japan to be too tough to face. There are many directions we can expand in, the American continent to the East, Indonesia, IndoChina and Australaisa to the South or, if we are to be so bold, we can claim everything in the name of the Empire!
We must focus on the weaker powers in the region
Australasia is ripe for Japanese occupation

After fall of United States into civil war, Philippines are left in dangerous world, full of various countries wanting to get numerous resources of Philippines. We, Japanese people, dream of united Asia, under our reasonable leadership. The first step of this union is to get Philippines into Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere.
Invite Philippians to Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere
We must bring them into fold !
An absurd notion, we will bring them into fold by force !

After fall of United States into civil war, Philippines are left alone. Such perfect oportunity must be fully used. Phillipines are potentially a perfect shelter for our navy and airforce, which will allow us to project our influence far into Pacific.
Invite Philippians to Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere
We must bring them into fold !
An absurd notion, we will bring them into fold by force !
A large Japanese task force has sailed into the islands and is threatening to attack us if we do not bow to their demand of full surrender!
Resist them and call for help!
Japan is pounding at the door of Philipines and they have come to us begging for assistance. Should we respond?
We can not strech ourselves so far.
Philippines are resisting our demands and Canadian state is backing their claim to independence
Back down, we can return later
Philippines are resisting our demands and the Canadian state is refusing to send aid. We should make them pay for this in blood.
Back down, we can return later
Seeing might of our forces , Philippines had no chance, but to ulimately submit before brave sons of nippon !
Japan invites us to Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere

Japanese seeing the empty space after Americans decided to leave, have invited us to their alliance. It could be chance to make us rich and prosperous but it can be deadly as Japan needs new markets and wnats to spread its political influence.
Due to Japanese expansion, Philippines decided to forge an alliance with us. We are far from Philippines and we have different goals, but we need as many allies, as we can.
Yes, they can be our allies
Canada doesn't want us in Entente
We have to face the truth - Japanese or dangerous isolation. The choice is ours
Due to Japanese expansion, Philippines decided to forge an alliance with us. We are far from Philippines and we have different goals, but we need as many allies, as we can.
Yes, they can be our allies
German Empire doesn't want us in Mitteleuropa
We have to face the truth - Japanese or dangerous isolation. The choice is ours
Philippines are refused our offer to become member of Co-prosperity sphere. Such transgression should not be tolerated !
Back down, we can return later
With the USA in chaos the Islands of Hawaii have declared their independence. They are weak and could provide a an easy target for expanding our influence in the region
Leave them alone, America is dangerous
With the USA in chaos the Islands of Hawaii have declared their independence. They are weak and could provide a an easy target for expanding our influence in the region
Leave them alone, America is dangerous
We have arranged for a naval taskforce to head to the Hawaii to force their government into submission. What is the overarcing goal of the expedition?
A large Japanese task force has sailed into the islands and is threatening to attack us if we do not bow to their demand of full surrender!
Resist them and call for help!
A large Japanese task force has sailed into the islands and is threatening to attack us if we do not bow down to them and accept their control over our future!
Resist them and call for help!
A large Japanese task force has sailed into the islands and is threatening to attack us if we do not bow down to them and accept giving their forces access to our islands
Resist them and call for help!
Not really worth fighting now is it
We have arranged for a diplomatic envoy to head to the Hawaii to force their government into submission. What is the overarcing goal of the expedition?

A high level envoy from Japan has brought a plan that would guarentee our independence while giving Japan the military bases it needs to secure the Pacific Ocean. It is likely that a negative answer will be taken well....
Resist them and call for help!

A high level envoy from Japan has brought a plan that would guarentee our independence while giving Japan the military bases it needs to secure the Pacific Ocean. It is likely that a negative answer will be taken well....
Resist them and call for help!

A high level envoy from Japan has brought a plan that would guarentee our independence while giving Japan the military bases it needs to secure the Pacific Ocean. It is likely that a negative answer will not be taken well....
Resist them and call for help!
Not really worth fighting now is it
Japan is pounding at the door of Hawaii and they have come to us begging for assistance. Should we respond?
Japan is pounding at the door of Hawaii and they have come to us begging for assistance. Should we respond? With the Civil War now may not be the time to start things with Japan...
Hawaii is resisting our demands and the Pacific States of America are backing their claim to independance
Back down, we can return later
Hawaii is resisting our demands and the Pacific States of America are refusing to send aid. We should make them pay for this in blood.
Back down, we can return later

With territories of Philiphines, Hawaii and Netherland East Indies secured, we must now choose our next step in reienforcing co-prosperity sphere. We can either choose to expand in different startegic directions or give up our expansionist plans.
Abandon expansionism, we have achieved our goals !

With territory of Australasian confederation secured, we must now choose our next step in reienforcing co-prosperity sphere. We can either choose to expand in different startegic directions or give up our expansionist plans.
We must focus on the weaker powers in the region !
Abandon expansionism, we have achieved our goals !

Our secret service reported that Japan considers to invade Indonesia in order to gain dominance in the Southern Pacific. Such drastical step means direct threat to stability of the entire Eastern Asia arrangement, which is currently set in our favor. What shall we do ?

The German Kaiser declared clearly that his Empire would fully support and protect Indonesia if any nation tries to invade them. It would be most unwise to underestimate it, despite troubles they are facing on the homefront. How shall we react to this statement ?
Give up our plans of expansion
The Empire of Japan invade Netherlands East India

Combined forces of the Empire of Japan have launched invasion of Netherlands East India. This invasion threatens to disrupt balance of powers in favour of Japan. Shall we warn yellow monkies about foolishness of their actions or let Netherlands East India fall into their hands ?
Warn them to turn back or face german arms!
Back Down! We've changed our minds!
The Second Reich has Sent an Ultimatum to Tokyo. We are to either pull out of Netherlands East India and declare a cease fire or Germany will come to Holland's aid.
We will not risk war with Germany, Back to the Boats!
We do not answer to Germany !
Germany has come to our aid! They have sent an ultimatum to the Japanese Empire, either fall back to their home islands or risk annihilation.
We Knew They'd Pull Through For Us!

After the ultimatum was received by Tokyo, they quickly sent orders to all their commanders on the ground to cease fire and return to the coast. We have achieved a diplomatic victory today, we have shown the world we will stand up to Japanese agression, and we will protect any nation under threat from Japan !
Diplomacy Has Achieved Peace Once Again!

After the ultimatum was received by Tokyo, they ignored it and are advancing into Indonesia, clearly ignoring our ultimatum. We can either go through and declare war, bringing Netherlands into our alliance or we can stand down and let Netherlands East India fall.
They have made their choice, war it is!
Back Down! We've changed our minds!
The Japanese Pull out of Indonesia
After the ultimatum was received by Tokyo, they quickly sent orders to all their commanders on the ground to cease fire and return to the coast. Our colonial emprire and our pride remain intact.
We couldn't have done it without Germany!

The collapse of the Russian government has left their borders open. With Primorsk already under Japanese control, expansion into Siberia is tempting and Kolchak has been waiting to bring all of Siberia under his, our control. Even Mongolia is a prime candidate, but now it is time to make our decision. The invasion is planned for years 1938-1939.
Russia is the best option of all
column3: The Bigger they Are, The Harder They Fall!

Imperial Rule Assistance Society: We must gain control over Siberia !
Mongolia is a threat to the stability of the region, it must be dealt with!

Our secret service reported that Japan considers to invade Russia in order to gain control over Siberia. Such drastical step means direct threat to stability of the entire Eastern Asia arrangement, which is currently set in our favor. What shall we do ?

The German Kaiser declared clearly that his Empire would fully support Russia if any nation tries to invade them. It would be most unwise to underestimate them, despite troubles they are facing on the homefront. How shall we react to this statement ?
Give up our plans of expansion

Before the Russo-Manchurian and -Transamurian borders our troops are positioned and ready to invade. First of all we should bring Russian pacific coast under our control. Simultaneously we should push forward Yakutsk and Novosibirsk.

In 1921 Mongolia occupied part of Russian siberian provinces. Across this provinces a section of the Trans-Siberian railroad is located and Russia takes a great interest to regain their land. Until now only their internal and military weakness discourage them to do it by force. But now, with Russia stable their interests shifted to this part of world once more. We can greatly speed our invasion if we allow Russia to take part in our plans to remove Mongolian state as threat to stability in the Eastern Asia

In 1921 tratcherous mongolians occupied part of our Siberian provinces. Across this provinces a large sections of the critically important Transsiberian railroad are located. Until now only our internal and military weakness discourage us to retake them by force. But now Japaneese Empire, which views Mongolian state as threat to stability in the Eastern Asia offered us to participate on their plans to conquer Mongolia.

In Vladivostok at the behest of their head of states a russian and japanese delegation signed a agreement to invade Mongolia together. After the defeat of Mongolia Russia will get their former land. In turn Russia will give us free reign within Mongolia.

In Vladivostok at the behest of their head of states a russian and japanese delegation signed a agreement to invade Mongolia together. After the defeat of Mongolia we will get our stolen territories back. In turn we will give Japan free reign within Mongolia.
Russia refused our proposition to invade Mongolia together. Once again the Russian state has shown the world its utter weakness.
So we have to do it alone.
The Pact of Vladivostok was signed. On the Mongolian borders Russian and Japanese troops are waiting for orders. It's time to invade this rogue state and bring stability to this part of world !
The Pact of Vladivostok was signed. On the Mongolian borders Russian and Japanese troops are waiting for orders. It's time to retake back what is ours !.

With territory of Siberia secured, we must now choose our next step in reienforcing co-prosperity sphere. We can either continue our expansion westwards, into Mongolia our choose different startegic direction.
Mongolia is a threat to the stability of the region, it must be dealt with!
Abandon expansionism, we have achieved our goals !

With territory of Mongolia under our firm control, we must now choose our next step in reienforcing co-prosperity sphere. We can either continue our expansion northwards, into Siberia our choose different startegic direction.
Abandon expansionism, we have achieved our goals !

With territory of Siberia and Mongolia secured, we must now choose our next step in reienforcing co-prosperity sphere. We can either choose to expand in different startegic directions or give up our expansionist plans.
Abandon expansionism, we have achieved our goals !
On the Mongolian borders Japanese troops are waiting for orders. It's time to invade Mongolia and bring stability to this part of world !
On the Siberian borders Japanese troops are waiting for orders. It's time to invade Siberia and bring stability to this part of world !

Belong the Manchurian and Transamurian borders our troops are positioned and ready to invade. First of all we should bring Russian pacific coast under our control and defeat Mongolia as far as possible. Simultaneously we should push forward Yakutsk and Lake Baikal.
Joint armed forces of Japan and Russia forced Mongolians to cease futile resistance and sign unconditional surrender before representatives of both nations. Fate of Mongolia is now in our hand.
Armed forces of Japanese Empire forced Mongolians to cease their futile resistance and sign unconditional surrender before representatives of our nation. Fate of Mongolia is now in our hand.

With territories of Mongolian state in turmoil, we have great oportunity to seize control over stolen parts of Trans-Siberian railway. There is very little that either Mongolia or Japan can do to stop us at this point.

We have kept territory of Mongolia under direct military control for some time. But some members of general staff are suggesting to release independent Mongolia as next member of co-prosperity sphere..

Japanese empire launched succesfull assault against mad Khan of Mongolia, which resulted in complete occupation of Mongolia, including territories stolen from us by Mongolia in 1920. Some members of our cabinet suggest to strike a deal with Japan to get our territories back. What shall we do ?
Let us offer a deal to Japan

Russian want to buy the northern provinces of the former Mongolia. This territory was annexed in 1920 by mad baron Sternberg and it contains long section of critically important Transsiberian railway.
Japan accepted our proposal and territories stolen in 1920 once again belong to us.
After defeat of Mongolia state, baron Roman Nikolai Maximilian von Ungern-Sternberg, known as mad baron fell into our hands. What shall we do with this dangerous lunatic ?
We don't fear him. Let him be
He is a danger. Dispel him.
He is too dangerous. Imprison him.
The Japanese Empire - after conquering Mongolia - sent us this dangerous enemy of Russia as a gift. What should we do to this madman and traitor of mother Russia ?
Exile him to the worst part of Siberia
A fanatic supporter of overthrowned mad baron was able to free him. We should have open eyes in Mongolia for he might try to return....
Try to invite Russia into our alliance !

Recent cooperation with Japan in conquest of Mongolia greatly strengthen mutual relations between two great nations. Japan empire decided to offer us participation in their alliance block, which is clearly aimed against German dominance in Pacific and Europe and want to form an alliance with us. How we shall respond ?
Accept, but demand Primorsk and Northern Sakhalin !
Russian state accepted our offer and entered military alliance with all members of Co-Prosperity Sphere.

The Russians have agreed in principle to an alliance aimed against German Empire and its allies in Asia, but as a precondition of their direct military support they want the return of territories taken by Japan during the Russian civil war, namely northern Sakhalin and Primorsk.

Facing the threat of Russian military force and deprived of the support of the local capitalists and the Japanese, Transamur's government is ready to collapse in the face of the popular will.  We can now do what we like with Transamur, but it has been independent for a long time and will be difficult to integrate into our country.  Perhaps some sort of compromise is needed ?
No compromise - put leadership on trial and incorporate Transamur
Establish a government of reconciliation: Kolchak for Prime Minister!
Administer Transamur as an autonomous zone. For now...

Our military campaign against Japanese Empire has been military catasthrope so far. Nearly the whole of East-Siberia has been taken by Japan. Many politicians are demanding to sign peace with Japan and end this war, even if on our expense....
Offer them the coast of pacific
Nearly the whole of East-Siberia has been taken by us. Now Russia begs for peace and offer us the Russian pacific coast. Shall we accept this offer ?
Better than we expected, accept the conditions
Japan refused our offer. Let them make regret their foolish decision.
Now we have to fullfill the harh conditions of the peace treaty we have signed. But later we will take our provinces back !
Now the Russian pacific coast is in our hands. We can either keep it for ourselves or hand it over to our loyal puppet, Transamur.
Japanese troops reached Ural and are currently directly threatening european part of our homeland . To prevent a total defeat we should try to appease Japan by offering them entire Siberia.

Our glorious troops have reached the Ural mountains. Humiliated Russia leadership is offering us control over whole Sibeira, if we sign peace with broken Russian state. On the other hand we have reached our main target to bring Siberia under direct military control and continuing this military struggle would serve no purpose.
Better than we expected, accept the conditions
Japan refused our generous offer. Let them make regret their foolish decision.
No we have to fullfill the conditions. At a later time we will get everything they havew stolen from us back !
Now Siberia is under our direct control. We can either release it as independent state, turn it over to Transamur or keep it for ourselves.
Siberia becomes part of Co-Prosperity Sphere
Siberia becomes part of Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere. This is indeed a great day for Japaneese empire.

Territory of Xibei Lianbang Yiyuan was occupied by Mongolian state since last Mongolian-Xibeian war which ended in total defeat of warlordism state. Upon hearing the collapse of his power, the inhabitants of this former state are demanding freedom. Granting them this wish would greatly weaken the Mongols.
Order Mongolia to secede Xibei Linbang Yinquan !
Our foreign masters have sent us an ultimatum to release the occupied territory of Xibei Lianbang Yiyuan. We have no other choice, but to comply....

A minor conflict about a section of Trans-Siberian railroad culminated in war between Russia and Mongolia. This tranverses our plans of expansion. Maybe it is also a good opportunity for us to launch our long-prepared military operations.
Take the chance and declare war on Russia

With the defeat of Mongolia the Trans-Siberian-War is over. Since Russian state showed remarkable strength some cautious politicians and military leaders are asking to reorientate our expansion into safer areas...
Give up our plans of expansion
The Russian government has proved itself unable to maintain the security of its Siberian territory. Regarding to our plans in this region we have to decide how to deal with this confusing situation.
Don´t change anything, continue with military preparations
Give up our plans of expansion

Kolchak realized that further resistance of his pseudo-state against us is hopeless. He was left no other chice, but to sign unconditional surrender of his rebellious state.
We have lost the control of our continental provinces. Now our homeland is directly threatend. Maybe we could appease the Russians with offering Korea, Port Arthur, Sachalin and Kuril Islands.

After we brought their continental provinces under our control Japan fearing might of our armed forces begs for peace. Therefor they offer us Korea, Port Arthur, Sachalin and Kuril Islands in exchange for cessation of hostilities between our states.
Now it is time to fullfill our conditions.
After the great defeat we have to go other ways.
We must return to our old ways of isolationism, Japan is a world in itself

Keep it under our direct control
We have decided that it will be in Russias best interest, if independent Korea emerges on Russian border. But how much independence will it really have ?
After our defeat in the First Russo-Japanese-War 1905 we had to relinquish Port Arthur to the Japaneese empire. Now it is under our control once again.
Give it to National government of China
After the Russians beat the Japanese they gained control of Port Arthur. They have decided that they have no use for it and instead have given it to us.

The Korean independence movement is spreading in Transmur using large existing korean minority and it could pose a future problem if it is not contained....

Let it be. They can’t push us out

The rise of Korean nationalism in our state has made Japan a bit nervous and they are insisting that we crack down on them. Failure to do this could draw Japan’s ire down upon us. But to crack down will make the people restless, especially our middle class which has a great number of Koreans.

When the demand for a crackdown was refused, many members of the Japanese government were taken aback by the disrespect for our nation’s security by our supposed younger ally who we have protected for so long from Russia. Now the question was what to do?
How dare they, send in the troops!
In a show of force, Japan has deployed their forces throughout Transmur in order to do the crackdown. It appears that Japan does not, nor has it respected our rights as a nation.
There is nothing we can do...
In order to force our hand, Japanese forces have marched on our capital and placed it under siege. We are not militarily strong enough to resist them in a full on conflict.
Resist and declare independece from Tokyo !
First it was Korean worries and now it is worries about Transmur. It seems that we should prepare plan in case our erstwhile ally decides to break away from us.
There is no need for drastic action yet...
Japanese troops move to arrest Kolchak!
After the our refusal to assist Japan fully in their troubles with the exiled Korean government Japan has moved to arrest and replace Our Dear Leader - Admiral and President Kolchak!
Resist and declare independece from Tokyo !

Naval blockade of the Korean peninsula

With the Korean peninsula engulfed with fires of revolution, many hostile nations might use this event as grand opportunity to weaken our influence in pacific by direct or indirect support of those damned revolutionaries. We can only prevent this by imposing naval blockade around entire Korean peninsula.
In desperate attempt to prevent our inevitable victory, the imperial japaneese navy has set up blockade around the entire Korean peninsula.

Our glorious navy continues to maintain complete naval blockade around the rebellious Korean peninsula, denying rebels much needed foreign aid. But some members of general staff argue, that naval blockade has already outlived its usefullness since rebels will be soon crushed and blockade itself is a very costly matter to us...
With fighting over Korean peninsula definitively over it is time for our navy to end this long and costly blockade.
Imperial Japaneese navy facing severe problems canceled deadly military blockade around Korean peninsula.
Our glorious armed forces decisively defeated korean rabble, forcing them to abandon their futile struggle !
The entire korean peninsula is now firmly integrated into our glorious Empire !

During occupation of Korea by forces of the Japaneese Empire, thousands of Japaneese were settled in our frontiers, founding many new farms and villages. With our independence regained, however, we could very well seize those lands and redistribute them amongst our own people! However, such populist move could harm our fragile economy, as a good part of our agriculture production comes from these farms.
Seize the farms and expell the Japaneese
Those settlers are important for our economy
During our occupation of Korea, thousands of Japaneese settlers moved to the area of Korean peninsula. Their newly-independent government has decided to expell them...
Our cousins the Yakuza have taken a fair amount of power in Japan and are moving it towards a militaristic and expansionist path. Maybe a deal could be brokered and we could enter their sphere
The Triad rulers of the Legation Cities have approached the Yakuza members of our government about a possible alliance in the interest of profits and exending our sphere our influence
The Triad rulers of the Legation Cities have approached the Yakuza members of our government about a possible alliance in the interest of profits and exending our sphere our influence
The Chinese Triads and the Japanese Yakuza in line with their governments have reached an agreement that will set the new future of Asia in motion!

Recently the triads have come under increased crack downs by the Legate Cities. The triads have called for help from Japan for a long time. Seeing their chance, Japan arranged for one of the riots to destroy their embassy in Shanghai. Using this outrage, Japan demanded the right to move troops into the city to restore order and prevent further loss of Japanese property or lives.
Use Imperial troops to secure the cities

The recent riots have caused a great deal of damage to the Japanese embassy. Now they have begun deploying troops into our cities to protect Japanese property and lives. This situation is highly volatile.
We can do nothing to stop them
Order our forces to evict the Japanese troops
The Legate Cities have capitulated and Japanese troops spread throughout the area. In a matter of a week, Japan was in control of all key areas of the Legate Cities and forced a regime change.
Legate cities try to evict our forces
The Legate Cities have ordered their troops to evict our own forces. A violent confrontation is all but inevitable as our men would rather die than give ground without the order to withdraw.
Japan refuses to remove their troops and continues with their plans. We must either remove them by force or back down.
We can do nothing to stop them

We can do nothing to stop them
Order our forces to evict the Japanese troops
Legation Council forces attack our Peacekeepers!
The Legation Council has officially ordered their forces to evict Japanese troops from the cities. It is time to crush them!
